participant_1.background:
I drink lots of iced tea and I try to do my laundry at least once a week.
i am tall and blonde.
i do not like animals.
I dress for my audience.
I have two secrets from my parents.

participant_2.background:

I want to take my uniform off and relax.
i enjoy broadway shows.
i am the youngest of 3.
my parents are in there 80s.

content.text: Hey there!  I'm about to go to bed, but I'd love to chat with you for a few minutes.
I'm down to chat for a bit!  How are you doing tonight?
I'm doing well, thanks!  Just got back from a long day at work.  How are you?
I'm doing okay!  I'm a little tired, but I'm excited to relax for the evening.
I hear that!  I'm going to be doing the same thing.  What do you like to do to relax?
I love to watch movies or read books.  I also enjoy listening to music.  What about you?
I like to do a lot of the same things!  I love to read, watch movies, and listen to music.  I also like to go for walks and spend time with my friends and family.
That sounds like a lot of fun!  I'm glad you have so many hobbies that you enjoy.
Thanks!  I try to keep myself busy.
What do you do for work?
I'm a nurse.  I work in a hospital.
Oh wow!  That must be a very rewarding job.
It is!  I love helping people.
That's awesome!  I'm glad you enjoy your job.
